post.body: you too? Sorry babe. I'll shoot you an email tomorrow. I need sleep now. Try to feel better, kay? *Hug*
if i wasn't allergic to marriage, i'd marry you in a heartbeat! =) i hope you have a great weekend as well. heart you!
oops i meant los angeles
thanks. i screwed things up BIG time, but i am determined to make it right. the tranny is from las vegas & was indeed funny.
i'm going to get those just to freak out my grandma. the whole cancer thing was a ruse. i went to the "baby store". lol thank you =)
i've got my ipod, a pic of my lovebug, my rubber duckie pjs, & my get well cards packed for the ayem. here's hoping all goes well. g'night.
unpacking my bags just to repack it. i go in tomorrow morning *sigh* oh well, at least i had fun one last time. phooey on being sick!
you're not truly home until you pass the bright neon lights of 'the happy go lucky'. lol
don't make me take off my shoe! too late... http://tinyurl.com/5gegaz//www.dlisted.com/&feature=player_embedded
i'm exhausted, running on no sleep & have to board a plane in 3 hours. still, such a kick ass time! can't wait to do it again in April! =)
a bittersweet moment..i just had (the last) group hug w/the 3 most important guys in my life. *sigh*
i-n-out burger.opens in like 3 hours. i plan on being the 1st customer of the day =)
ipod is synched, bags are packed--headed to vegas & hellay. you kids be good! don't make me take off my shoe! =)
a big huge ginormous welcome to @knuckles666!!! welcome to the fold! one of us! one of us! haha luv ya girlie!
"Overturn Prop 8" rally today @ 12.30p, City Hall 901 Bagby St. See you there! Equality is a right not a privilege!
it would be lovely to have 1 day where my head didn't feel like someone beat it w/a sledgehammer. i think i'm going to take the vicodin...
please sign the petition to reopen Prop 8 & Re-tweet.. http://www.petitiononline.com/seg5130/petition.html
wow! Congrats! PRESIDENT OBAMA!!!
Re-tweet @BarackObama: Vote Nov. 4th. Visit http://VoteForChange.com, call 877-874-6226 or text VOTE to 62262 to find your polling locations
the yard is clean and my uncle fixed our porch...guess i can study for midterms or take a nap or venture out into the world...hmm...
homer simpson vs. the voting machine of terror http://tinyurl.com/3l89e2
i've got a wicked headache. i really want a new pair of eyes under my x-mas tree. hopefully a nap will make it better before this evening.
hahahaha. oh. my.god! i will never look at skittles the same way! haha http://tinyurl.com/3vnzn7
i <3 my talented friend that lives out of his suitcase, eats super strange animal parts & keeps pressuring me to get a new passport =)
i love how people's true colors always show despite lights being on or off. the order in which they see you also becomes crystal clear...
i slept through the night & woke up w/no chest pains! thank jeebus. that means no more hospital sleepover tonight. now if i could just eat..
been listening to sad songs & now crying over the movie 'the break up'. not because the movie is bad (it is) but cause, yeah...this sucks =(
last night was bad, really really bad but i'm hoping it gets better. i'm not letting go without a fight. sorry. you mean too much to me.
I can't believe i lost someone i loved more than anything. All because i'm me and i'm an idiot.
walking around a super walmart isn't such a good idea just yet. however, i am going to try to get out a little more. being outside was nice.
i'm going to attempt to drive myself to walmart. i've got ginger gum for the nausea & a hat to protect my eye. i can do this. right? =/
instead of going from hospital to my bed, mi amigo took me to the park. there's something about fresh air..today is a much better day.
